events.description: The release of international arrival data for Vietnam in January 2026, showing record-high numbers.

facts.fact_text: International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year to 2.45 million in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year to 2.45 million in January 2026, the highest since records began in 2015

facts.fact_text: Arrivals from Europe surged by 59.0% in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: In Europe, arrivals surged by 59.0%, with notable increases from Russia (195.1%), the UK (23.0%), France (25.3%), and Germany (18.0%).

facts.fact_text: Arrivals from Asia increased by 12.3%, led by growth from Cambodia and India.

evidences.evidence_text: Arrivals from Asia increased by 12.3%, led by strong growth from Cambodia (122.7%), India (80.5%)

claims.claim_text: Visa policies and marketing innovations were key drivers in attracting international visitors.

evidences.evidence_text: Breakthrough visa policies, innovative in promotion and marketing, increased product diversification, and improved service quality helped attract a large number of international visitors.

evidence.evidence_text: Breakthrough visa policies... helped attract a large number of international visitors.
International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year to 2.45 million in January 2026, the highest since records began in 2015
